xuiSidebarContainer
directive in module xui

Description

Parent component for xuiSidebar.

Usage

as element:
<xui-sidebar-container
       [layout="{String}"]>
</xui-sidebar-container>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
layout
(optional)
String

If attribute equals to "fill", layout of xuiSidebarContainer will be changed from default to fill, so xuiSidebarContainer height will be equal to parent element height. Parent element should have specified height. In case you need to use default layout, set "layout" attribute to "default" or do not specify the attribute at all
